name: Jobbintervju VR
summary: The Job interview VR app provides an immersive experience of a job interview. The app can be used to train and prepare for a job interview.  The simulation is based on a scenario that contains 12 main questions and 14 additional comments or questions that appear optionally depending on the answers to the main questions. In the interview scenario, the user takes the role of the job candidate and goes through a typical job interview. The interviewer appears in a typical office room, captured in a...
